short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily switch to picture-in-picture mode when the video is cropped.（動画が見切れた際に簡単にピクチャーインピクチャーモードに切り替えることができます。）

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview 
This extension provides the ability to display Picture-in-Picture (PIP) with just one click. Previously, this action required three clicks, but now it can be done with a single click. This extension enhances the viewing experience by enabling users to comfortably watch videos while reading comments. With this simple and convenient extension, you can enjoy a smoother video viewing experience.

-How to Display Picture-in-Picture (PIP)
1. Go to Youtube.com and play a video.
2. Scroll down until the video is completely hidden.
3. Click anywhere within the browser window.

-How to Hide Picture-in-Picture (PIP)
1. Scroll to the top of the page within the browser window.

Supported Browser: Chrome
